name: taskwise-pwa
description: A simple PWA with Google login

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:clean: find public -maxdepth 1 -name '*.html' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.json' | grep -v public/js | xargs rm -f
scripts.build:copy: cp index.html app.js styles.css sw.js manifest.json public/
